message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you can have the remaining 10%.  It's a good start!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not giving away the farm just yet!
Okay, I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40 this time.  It's a better deal for both of us than the last round.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. You're getting a good deal here, don't get too greedy!
I'm feeling generous. Let's split it 55/45 this time.  It's a fair deal considering the inflation, and we can finally end this game.
